title: Drawing, "View of a Mountain Across a Plain, Colombia", July 1853
inscribed:
Recto:  Inscribed in graphite with captions, respectively:  Bamboo / shope of leaf of / a tree whose leaves / are nearly white / arum [probably not in artist's hand]; and dated at center: July -53-.

Verso:  Inscribed in graphite, at ?: plain
description: Horizontal view of trees, trunks and details.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "View of a Mountain Across a Plain, Colombia", July 1853.
July 1853. Graphite on paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-85.
